full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YID DANG KUN GZHI'I DGA' BA'I GNAS KYI RTZA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,YID SHES GCIG NYID DBANG DRUG GI ,RTEN LA SO SOR RGYU BA'I TSE, SO SOR MIN DU BTAGS PA TZAM, ,BRAM ZE'I TSOMS DANG SKYE MCHED NI, ,BCU GNYIS STON PA'I MDO LAS KYANG, ,GCIG PUR GSUNGS DANG RNAM SHES DRUG ,YID KYI SKYE MCHED YID GSUNGS PHYIR, SHES KUN YID SHES GCIG PU LO, ,LUNG DON GZHAN DU NUS PHYIR DANG, ,DBANG SHES @009B KYIS KYANG LKOG GYUR DANG, ,'DAS DAD MA 'ONGS 'DZIN GYUR PHYIR, ,TSOGS GCIG 'DOD PA MUN SPRUL LO, ,DE PHYIR YID CHES LUNG RIGS KYIS, ,GRUB PA RNAM SHES BRGYAD YIN PHYIR, GSANG BA'I GNAS LA MI ZHUM PA'I, ,MKHAS PA'I BRGYAD NYID 'DOD PAR BYA, YID DANG KUN GZHI'I DKA' BA'I GNAS, ,GSAL BAR STON 'DI MKHAS MCHOG RNAMS, ,JI LTAR BZHAD BZHIN BLA MA YI, GSUNG LA BRTEN NAS RGYAL KHAMS PA, ,BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I @010A *, ,SBYAR BA YI, ,DGE DES THUB BSTAN RGYAS GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, ,RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSRUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SPRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
